poem:
### Aftermath

In the dust of a hurried exit,  
whispers of old alliances linger,  
trails of numbers and names,  
displacements marked on a map  
where shadows grow more cunning.  
Under the fickle cloak of safety,  
homes mutate into memories,  
while the wind carries secrets,  
deserting freedoms unguarded.
